56 public:

62  static Quaternion fromAxisAngle(const Vector3& axis, real_g angle);

69  static Quaternion fromEulerAngles(const EulerAngles& eulerAngles);
70 
72  template<typename T, size_t N>
73  static Quaternion fromRotationMatrix(const SquareMatrix<T, N>& rot) {
74  static_assert(N >= 3, "Error, matrix not of sufficient size");
75  // Algorithm from:
76  // http://www.j3d.org/matrix_faq/matrfaq_latest.html#Q55
77  real_g scalar;
78  real_g axis[3];
79  const real_g trace = rot(0, 0) + rot(1, 1) + rot(2, 2);
80  if (trace > 0.00000001f) {
81  const real_g s = 2.0f * std::sqrt(trace + 1.0f);
82  scalar = 0.25f * s;
83  axis[0] = (rot(2, 1) - rot(1, 2)) / s;
84  axis[1] = (rot(0, 2) - rot(2, 0)) / s;
85  axis[2] = (rot(1, 0) - rot(0, 1)) / s;
86  }
87  else {
88  static int s_next[3] = { 1, 2, 0 };
89  int i = 0;
90  if (rot(1, 1) > rot(0, 0))
91  i = 1;
92  if (rot(2, 2) > rot(i, i))
93  i = 2;
94  int j = s_next[i];
95  int k = s_next[j];
96  const real_g s = 2.0f * std::sqrt(rot(i, i) - rot(j, j) - rot(k, k) + 1.0f);
97  axis[i] = 0.25f * s;
98  scalar = (rot(k, j) - rot(j, k)) / s;
99  axis[j] = (rot(j, i) + rot(i, j)) / s;
100  axis[k] = (rot(k, i) + rot(i, k)) / s;
101  }
102  return Quaternion(axis[0], axis[1], axis[2], scalar);
103  }
